paragraphs.text:
%hive
-- Create the "drive_temp" working space in prepration for features.
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS drive_temp
STORED AS PARQUET LOCATION 'hdfs:///user/hive/warehouse/drive_temp' TBLPROPERTIES ("parquet.compression"="SNAPPY")
AS SELECT vehicle_id,
    trip_id,
    datetime,
    previous_velocity,
    velocity,
    acceleration,
    SUM(group_start) OVER (PARTITION BY vehicle_id, trip_id ORDER BY datetime) AS acceleration_group
FROM (
    SELECT vehicle_id,
        trip_id,
        datetime,
        previous_velocity,
        velocity,
        acceleration,
        CASE WHEN SIGN(acceleration) != SIGN(LAG(acceleration, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY vehicle_id, trip_id ORDER BY datetime)) AND t1.acceleration != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS group_start
    FROM (
        SELECT vehicle_id,
            trip_id,
            datetime,
            LAG(velocity, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY vehicle_id, trip_id ORDER BY datetime) AS previous_velocity,
            velocity,
            (velocity - LAG(velocity, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY vehicle_id, trip_id ORDER BY datetime)) AS acceleration
        FROM drive
    ) t1
) t2

%hive
-- Create the "engine_temp" working space in prepration for features.
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS engine_temp
STORED AS PARQUET LOCATION 'hdfs:///user/hive/warehouse/engine_temp' TBLPROPERTIES ("parquet.compression"="SNAPPY")
AS SELECT vehicle_id,
    trip_id,
    datetime,
    timestamp_pst,
    week_start_date,
    eng_load,
    rpm,
    vehicle_make,
    vehicle_max_torque,
    vehicle_max_horsepower,
    vehicle_max_horsepower_rpm,
    CASE WHEN t1.vehicle_max_torque != 0 THEN (eng_load / 255 * t1.vehicle_max_torque * rpm / 5252) ELSE t1.vehicle_max_torque END AS active_horsepower,
    CASE WHEN t1.vehicle_max_horsepower != 0 THEN (eng_load / 255 * t1.vehicle_max_torque * rpm / 5252 / t1.vehicle_max_horsepower) ELSE t1.vehicle_max_horsepower END AS horsepower_utilization,
    (eng_load / 255) AS torque_utilization,
    CASE WHEN t1.vehicle_max_horsepower_rpm != 0 THEN (rpm / t1.vehicle_max_horsepower_rpm) ELSE t1.vehicle_max_horsepower_rpm END AS rpm_utilization
FROM (
    SELECT drive.vehicle_id,
        drive.trip_id,
        drive.datetime,
        FROM_UTC_TIMESTAMP(FROM_UNIXTIME(CAST(datetime/1000 AS BIGINT)), 'PST') as timestamp_pst,
        DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(CAST(datetime/1000 AS BIGINT)), CAST(FROM_UNIXTIME(CAST(datetime/1000 AS BIGINT), 'u') AS INT) - 1) AS week_start_date,
        drive.eng_load,
        drive.rpm,
        CASE WHEN LENGTH(vehicle.make) > 0 THEN vehicle.make ELSE "undefined" END AS vehicle_make,
        CASE WHEN LENGTH(vehicle.max_torque) > 0 THEN vehicle.max_torque ELSE 0 END AS vehicle_max_torque,
        CASE WHEN LENGTH(vehicle.max_horsepower) > 0 THEN vehicle.max_horsepower ELSE 0 END AS vehicle_max_horsepower,
        CASE WHEN LENGTH(vehicle.max_horsepower_rpm) > 0 THEN vehicle.max_horsepower_rpm ELSE 0 END AS vehicle_max_horsepower_rpm
    FROM drive
    LEFT OUTER JOIN vehicle
    ON drive.vehicle_id = vehicle.vehicle_id
) t1
